edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prf

Interface Hmac

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Mac, MacSignSecLevel, OneTime, PrfVaryingInputLength, PseudorandomFunction, SecurityLevel, UniqueTagMac, UnlimitedTimes
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BcHMAC, OpenSSLHMAC

    public interface Hmac
extends PrfVaryingInputLength, UniqueTagMac, UnlimitedTimes
    Marker interface. Every class that implements it is signed as Hmac. Hmac has varying input length and thus implements the interface PrfVaryingInputLength.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Meital Levy)

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prf.PseudorandomFunction

        computeBlock, computeBlock, computeBlock, generateKey, generateKey, getAlgorithmName, getBlockSize, isKeySet, setKey

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.symmetricCrypto.mac.Mac

        doFinal, generateKey, generateKey, getAlgorithmName, getMacSize, isKeySet, mac, setKey, update, verify
